content: Hi. Looking to go to my first HL7 event... but I can't register. Registering requires creating an account on https://www.hl7.org/, and trying to do that always redirects to a login screen. Any secrets to creating an HL7 account?
Brian, Sorry for the inconvenience. We have had a firewall die at our co-location and are working at replacing it. ETA is 2 hours.
Alright thanks ... I tried yesterday too. Just making sure I wasn't missing something.
